qas.question: LED lighting is the end result of what phenomenon?
What was the nationality of the man who discovered Electroluminescence?
What type of detector did H.J. Round use to help him in his discovery?
Who is the Soviet man that created the first LED?
LED lighting is the beginning result of what phenomenon?
What was the nationality of the woman who discovered Electroluminescence?
What type of light did H.J. Round use to help him in his discovery?
Who is the Soviet man that created the second LED?

context: <a0_0><b5_0>Electroluminescence<b5_0/><a0_0/> as a phenomenon was discovered in <a1_0><b6_0>1907<b6_0/><a1_0/> by the <a2_0><b7_0>British<b7_0/><a2_0/> experimenter H. J. Round of Marconi Labs, using a crystal of silicon carbide and a <a3_0><b8_0>cat's-whisker<b8_0/><a3_0/> detector. Soviet inventor <a4_0><b9_0>Oleg Losev<b9_0/><a4_0/> reported creation of the first LED in 1927. His research was distributed in Soviet, German and British scientific journals, but no practical use was made of the discovery for several decades. Kurt Lehovec, Carl Accardo and Edward Jamgochian, explained these first light-emitting diodes in 1951 using an apparatus employing SiC crystals with a current source of battery or pulse generator and with a comparison to a variant, pure, crystal in 1953.
